landing.heroTitle:
Build Smarter
Inspect Faster
Deliver Excellence
landing.heroSubtitle: Streamline your construction management with our comprehensive platform. From project planning to final inspection, we've got you covered.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything you need to manage construction projects
landing.featuresSubtitle: From equipment tracking to inspection management, BuilderOps provides the tools your team needs to deliver projects on time and on budget.

features.realTimeTrackingDesc: Monitor project progress, equipment status, and team activities with live dashboards and instant notifications.
features.equipmentManagementDesc: Track equipment approvals, submissions, and compliance documents across all your active projects.
features.inspectionSystemDesc: Schedule inspections, assign consultants, and manage compliance checklists with full audit trails.
features.teamCollaborationDesc: Coordinate between project managers, inspectors, and contractors with role-based access control.
features.approvalWorkflowsDesc: Streamline multi-step approval processes for equipment, materials, and RFIs with automated routing.
features.analyticsReportsDesc: Generate insights with project analytics, workload tracking, and exportable reports for stakeholders.

landing.ctaTitle: Ready to streamline your construction operations?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join 500+ construction teams already using BuilderOps to deliver projects on time.

mobilePreview.title: Take BuilderOps to the Field
mobilePreview.subtitle: Access your project data, submit inspections, and manage approvals right from your phone. Stay connected with your team wherever the job takes you.

testimonials.quote1: BuilderOps transformed how we manage inspections across our 12 active sites. The real-time tracking alone saved us 15 hours per week.
testimonials.quote2: We reduced our approval cycle time by 60%. The workflow automation is exactly what our team needed to stay on schedule.
testimonials.quote3: The inspection management system gives us complete visibility. Our compliance rate went from 82% to 97% in just three months.

pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your team. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small teams getting started with construction management.

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: For growing teams that need advanced workflows and analytics.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations with custom security and integration needs.

sidebar.title: Navigation Sidebar
sidebar.content: Use the sidebar to navigate between different sections of the platform. Access your dashboard, projects, and more.

projects.title: Projects
projects.content: View and manage all your construction projects. Click here to see your project list and create new ones.

equipment.title: Equipment Management
equipment.content: Track all project equipment, manage approval submissions, and upload required documents.

materials.title: Materials Tracking
materials.content: Manage materials inventory, track deliveries, and submit materials for approval.

approvals.title: Approval Workflows
approvals.content: Review and process approval requests for equipment, materials, and other items.

chat.title: AI Assistant
chat.content: Chat with the AI assistant to get quick insights about your project data and perform actions.

reports.name: Name
reports.subject: Subject
reports.weeklyAiDescription: AI-generated weekly progress report with narrative summary, charts, and key metrics.
reports.inspectionAiDescription: AI-powered inspection summary with findings analysis, photos, and recommendations.
reports.executiveAiDescription: High-level executive summary with project health indicators and critical items.

reports.editWarning: Editing HTML directly. Be careful to preserve the structure and styling.

createProject.title: Creating a Project
createProject.description: Create a new project by navigating to the Projects page and clicking Add Project. Fill in the name, code, and dates.

inviteTeam.title: Inviting Team Members
inviteTeam.description: Go to project settings to invite team members via email. Assign roles like admin, supervisor, or contractor.

addEquipment.title: Adding Equipment
addEquipment.description: Add equipment from templates or manually. Fill in the type, manufacturer, model, and serial number.

equipmentApproval.title: Equipment Approval Process
equipmentApproval.description: Submit equipment for approval after uploading required documents. Consultants will review and approve or request revisions.

addMaterial.title: Adding Materials
addMaterial.description: Add materials with quantity, unit, and supplier details. Use templates for common material types.

materialApproval.title: Material Approval Process
materialApproval.description: Submit materials for approval similar to equipment. Track approval status through the workflow steps.

scheduleInspection.title: Scheduling Inspections
scheduleInspection.description: Schedule inspections by selecting a consultant type and date. Assign inspectors from your contacts list.

checklists.title: Using Checklists
checklists.description: Create checklist instances from templates. Fill them out in the field and mark items as approved, rejected, or N/A.

createRfi.title: Creating an RFI
createRfi.description: Create a Request for Information with a subject, question, and recipient. Add CC emails and attachments as needed.

respondRfi.title: Responding to RFIs
respondRfi.description: View RFI details and add responses in the conversation thread. Close the RFI when the question is resolved.

reviewApproval.title: Reviewing Approvals
reviewApproval.description: Check the Approvals page for pending requests. Review details and approve or reject with comments.

approvalWorkflow.title: Understanding Approval Workflows
approvalWorkflow.description: Approvals follow a multi-step workflow with consultant review and inspector approval. Track progress in the stepper.

tooltips.equipmentForm: Fill in equipment details. Use a template for pre-filled specifications and documents.
tooltips.materialForm: Add material details including quantity and supplier. Templates provide standard specs.
tooltips.rfiForm: Create a Request for Information. The recipient will be notified via email.
tooltips.inspectionForm: Select a consultant type and schedule date. The assigned inspector will be notified.
